Html: On running make in the external-code folder of ccompiler, a 404 error pops up when pycparser download is requested. How can I fix this? Can someone update the link in the makefile?

It looks like the pycparser project migrated to github. You can use:

wget --no-check-certificate https://pypi.python.org/packages/source/p/pycparser/pycparser-2.08.tar.gz

instead. I'll update the makefile when I get a moment.
